constraints.name: minimization_constraint
constraints.description: 每个顾客选择使 xi = ci * p 最小的队列，其中 ci 是队列中的人数，p 是队列中最后两个人的平均购买数量（如果队列中有两个人或更多）。
constraints.formal: xi = ci * p, where p = (p1 + p2) / 2 if ci >= 2, p = p1 if ci = 1, and p = 0 if ci = 0

constraints.name: tie_breaking_rule
constraints.description: 如果多个队列的 xi 值相同，顾客选择编号最小的队列。
constraints.formal: If multiple queues have the same xi, choose the one with the smallest index i.

constraints.name: sequential_decision
constraints.description: 每个顾客在下一个顾客开始选择之前完成自己的选择。
constraints.formal: Customer i makes their choice before customer i+1 starts.
